blogPost.excerpt: The Indiecast is made by Makers rocket. It's a podcast where we talk to and with Indie hackers to share their untold stories, Products, and How they built their Indie Business!
blogPost.body: The Indiecast is made by Makers rocket. It's a podcast where we talk to and with Indie hackers to share their untold stories, Products, and How they built their Indie Business!
blogPost.title: The Indiecast - Sharing the untold stories of Indie Hackers
blogPost.author: Arav Narula

localize.description: Indiecast是由Makers rocket制作的。这是一个播客，我们与独立黑客们一起分享他们不为人知的故事，产品，以及他们如何建立自己的独立事业！我们的播客是由Makers rocket制作的。
localize.tagline: 分享独立黑客们不为人知的故事

localize.description: Indiecast是由Makers rocket製作的。這是一個播客，我們與獨立黑客們一起分享他們不爲人知的故事，產品，以及他們如何建立自己的獨立事業！我們的播客是由Makers rocket製作的。
localize.tagline: 分享獨立黑客們不爲人知的故事

previous.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate property investment analysis tool which helps you find the best investment opportunities nearby.
previous.title: DataMool - Global predictive residential property investment analysis

localize.description: DataMool是一款预测性的住宅房地产投资分析工具，可以帮助您找到附近的最佳投资机会。
localize.tagline: 全球预测性住宅物业投资分析

localize.description: DataMool是一款預測性的住宅房地產投資分析工具，可以幫助您找到附近的最佳投資機會。
localize.tagline: 全球預測性住宅物業投資分析

next.excerpt: Bring together your startup’s key info under a custom URL with privacy settings and analytics built in. New features: 🎉 Invite your Team ⚡ Multiple OnePagers 🤠 Multiple Orgs 💸 Recommended Investors
next.title: OnePager 2.0 - Custom webpages with analytics for a startup’s information

localize.description: 将您的创业公司的关键信息汇集到一个自定义的URL下，并内置隐私设置和分析功能。新功能。🎉 Invite your Team ⚡ Multiple OnePagers 🤠 Multiple Orgs 💸 Recommended Investors（推荐投资者）。
localize.tagline: 创业公司信息分析的定制网页

localize.description: 將您的創業公司的關鍵信息彙集到一個自定義的URL下，並內置隱私設置和分析功能。新功能。🎉 Invite your Team ⚡ Multiple OnePagers 🤠 Multiple Orgs 💸 Recommended Investors（推薦投資者）。
localize.tagline: 創業公司信息分析的定製網頁
